content: Tuition Payment Plan is offered Fall and Spring only. Tuition, program/college fees, and mandatory fees are split into three installments. A $75 non-refundable enrollment fee applies each semester. Students must enroll before the Tuition Payment Deadline to avoid late charges. Payments are not auto-drafted—students must pay each installment by its deadline. Not available for Study Abroad, Winter, or Summer.

Enroll via UAccess Student Center each semester (not available in Guest Center): BURSAR ACCOUNT → 'Enroll in Payment Plan'. If unable to enroll, a hold may exist—contact the department listed on the hold (e.g., Campus Health, Advising).
Any credit that posts while enrolled will apply to future installments until the balance reaches zero. Refer to Payment Plan Terms & Conditions for details.
Spring 2026 dates: Enrollment window is Dec 5, 2025–Jan 27, 2026. Installments due: 1st—Jan 14, 2026; 2nd—Feb 14, 2026; 3rd—Mar 17, 2026.
